sect1.title: SPIRV-Headers-&spirv-headers-version;

sect2.title: Installation of SPIRV-Headers

note.para: This tarball SPIRV-Headers-&spirv-headers-version;.tar.gz will extract to the directory SPIRV-Headers-vulkan-sdk-&spirv-headers-version;.

sect2.para: Install SPIRV-Headers by running the following commands:

screen.userinput:
mkdir build && cd build &&
cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr -G Ninja .. && ninja

sect2.para: This package does not come with a test suite.
